National Pingtung University (NPTU) was founded on August 1, 2014 with the mergier of National Pingtung University of Education and the National Pingtung Institute of Commerce. The Origins of both universities were respectively the Taiwan Governor General Normal School established in April, 1940, and National Pingtung Junior College of Commerce established in July, 1991.
National Pingtung University has 4 campuses, namely the Minsheng campus, the Pingshang campus, the Pingshi campus, and Checheng campus, The administrative center is located in the city and is close to every department where traffic and transportation are convenient and available, so it has the great potential for future development. In addition to the Administrative Affairs Organization, there are 5 colleges of Liberal Arts and Social Sciences, Education, Sciences, Management, and Computer Sciences. Most departments provide both under- and post-graduate programs.

Founded 1895 as Academy of Language. Acquired present status 2005. Formerly known Taipei Municipal University of Education. Merged with Taipei Physical Education College 2013.

Founded 1972. Renamed Van Nung Institute of Industry 1973 and then Van Nung Institute of Industry and Commerce 1990. Upgraded into Van Nung Institute of Technology 1999. Acquired present status and title 2004.
Founded 1966. Upgraded into Wenzao Ursuline College of Languages 1999. Acquired present status and title 2013.

Founded 1963 as Wu Feng College of Business. Became Wu Feng Industrial College 1969, Wu Feng Industrial and Commercial College 1992, Wu Feng Institute of Technology 2000. Acquired present status and title 2012.

Address.college_name: Yu Da University of Science and Technology

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1999 as Yu Da College of Business. Acquired present title 2009.
Founded 1989. Acquired present status and title 1997.
GeneralInformation.AcademicYear: September to June (September- January; February- June)
AdmissionRequirements: High school certificate

GeneralInformation.History: Founded as a medical school 1964 . Renamed Yuanpei College of Medical Technology 1968 and then upgraded into Yuanpei Institute of Science and Technology 1999. Acquired present status and title 2006. Former Yuanpei Institute of Science and Technology.
Founded in 2014 after the merging of Dharma Drum College of Humanities and Social Sciences and the Dharma Drum Buddhist College
